REF AD2.22.5.1.3 COORDINATION WITH NETWORK : READ : 'CDG AIRPORT PDS IS DIRECTLY CONNECTED WITH THE NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER (NMOC) FOR DATA EXCHANGE (COLLABORATIVE MANAGEMENT OF FLIGHT UPDATES). DATA ARE AUTOMATICALLY EXCHANGED THROUGH DPI AND API MESSAGES, WHICH INCLUDE TARGET TAKE-OFF TIMES, TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT BY NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR EN ROUTE TRAFFIC PREDICTION AND FOR SLOT ALLOCATION. DPI AND API ARE OF DIFFERENT TYPES : GENERAL ARRIVAL PLANNING INFORMATION (G-API) PREDICTED DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION EARLY DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (E-DPI) TARGET DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (T-DPI) ATC DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (A-DPI) CANCEL DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (C-DPI) THE REA MESSAGE IS NO LONGER USED AND REPLACED BY DPI MESSAGES SYSTEMATICALLY AND AUTOMATICALLY SENT. INSTEAD OF : 'CDG AIRPORT PDS IS DIRECTLY CONNECTED WITH THE NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR DATA EXCHANGE (COLLABORATIVE MANAGEMENT OF FLIGHT UPDATES). DATA ARE AUTOMATICALLY EXCHANGED THROUGH DPI MESSAGES, WHICH INCLUDE TARGET TAKE-OFF TIMES, TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT BY NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR EN ROUTE TRAFFIC PREDICTION AND FOR SLOT ALLOCATION. DPI ARE OF DIFFERENT TYPES : EARLY DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (E-DPI) TARGET DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (T-DPI) ATC DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (A-DPI) THE REA MESSAGE IS NO LONGER USED AND REPLACED BY DPI MESSAGES SYSTEMATICALLY AND AUTOMATICALLY SENT.'

THE CHAPTER 22.2.3 IS UPDATED ACCORDINGLY: 22.2.3 COORDINATION WITH NETWORK ORLY AIRPORT PDS IS DIRECTLY CONNECTED TO THE NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER (NMOC) FOR DATA EXCHANGE (COLLABORATIVE MANAGEMENT OF FLIGHT UPDATES). DATA ARE AUTOMATICALLY EXCHANGED THROUGH DPI AND API MESSAGES WHICH INCLUDE TARGET TAKE-OFF TIME AND ESTIMED LANDING TIME, TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT BY THE NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR EN-ROUTE TRAFFIC PREDICTION AND FOR SLOT ALLOCATION. DIFFERENT TYPES OF DPI AND API ARE: -GENERAL ARRIVAL PLANNING INFORMATION (G-API) -PREDICTED DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (P-DPI) -EARLY DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (E-DPI) -TARGET DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (T-DPI) -ATC DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (A-DPI) -CANCEL DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (C-DPI) THE REA MESSAGE IS NO LONGER TO BE USED REA AS IT IS REPLACED BY DPI MESSSAGES SYSTEMATICALLY AND AUTOMATICALLY SENT. REF AIP AD2 22.2.3

SX0089/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPB/PARIS/LE BOURGET MODIFICATION AIP FRANCE AD2 LFPB REGARDING SB CONVENTIONAL DEP PROC FM PARIS - LE BOURGET FURTHER TO PTV VOR AND NDB POY EXTINCTION VALIDITY: 13JUN24- 30OCT24 VOR PTV FM THE 12/29/2022 RPLC BY THE WPT (5LNC) OLZOM, NDB POY FM 15/06/23 RPLC BY WPT OXCEL. RESULTS IN THE MODIFICATION OF THE SB CONVENTIONAL DEP PROC BASED ON THIS AID.TEMPO OPR PROC ARE IMPLEMENTED IN ORDER TO HANDLE THE SB DEP ACFT, WHILE AWAITING THE DESIGN OF NEW RNAV STD INITIAL DEP PROC - ALL SID PTV DEP LFPB ARE REMOVED. - ALL SIDS USING POY DEP FM LE BOURGET ARE AFFECTED BY THE EXTINCTION OF NDB POY. SOME INITIAL PARTS OF SID MONOT AND DORDI DEP FM LFPB ARE NOT AFFECTED AND THEREFORE REMAIN USABLE.THE NEW WP OXCEL REPLACES POY AND MUST BE INPUT IN NAVIGATION SYSTEMS OF AIRPLANES DEPARTING FROM LE BOURGET THAT USE THESE ROUTES. ******************************** DEP 07/09 TO OLZOM / MONOT WITH SID LFPB 5J IN FORCE - SID CONV MONOT 5J NOT USABLE - SID DORDI 5J REMAINS USABLE - THE FLW DEP CLR CONFIRMED BY AD DELIVERY : FLW DEP SID CONV DORDI 5J CMB 3000 FT AMSL, UP TO D 17.1 NM FM MLN, THEN EXP VECTORING TO OLZOM OR MONOT - RADIOCOMMUNICATION FAILURE : SQUAWK 7600 FLW DEP SID CONV DORDI 5J CMB 3000 FT AMSL, UP TO D 17.1 NM FM MLN, THEN PCD DCT OLZOM OR MONOT COMPLY WITH THE LAST LVL CLEARED BY ATC TIL D 40 NM LOL THEN CONT THE FLT ACCORDING FPL IN FORCE ******************************** DEP 07/09 TO OLZOM / MONOT WITH SID LFPB 5M IN FORCE - SID DORDI 5M NOT USABLE - SID MONOT 5M REMAINS USABLE IN ITS INITIAL PART UP TO RADIAL 073 TSU INCLUDED. - THE FLW DEP CLR CONFIRMED BY AD DELIVERY : FLW THE INITIAL PART OF THE DEP SID MONOT 5M CMB FL 070, THEN INTERCEPT AND FLW THE 073 TSU (MAG 253), THEN PSG BT 180 RADIAL TURN LEFT MAG 190, THEN EXP VECTORING TO OXCEL THEN OLZOM OR MONOT OR DORDI - RADIOCOMMUNICATION FAILURE : SQUAWK 7600 FLW THE INITIAL PART OF THE DEP SID MONOT 5M CMB FL 070, THEN INTERCEPT AND FLW THE 073 TSU (MAG 253), THEN PSG BT 180 RADIAL TURN LEFT MAG 190 TOWARDS OXCEL, THEN PCD DCT TO OLZOM OR MONOT OR DORDI COMPLY WITH THE LAST LVL CLEARED BY ATC TIL D 40 NM LOL THEN CONT THE FLT ACCORDING FPL IN FORCE ******************************** DEP 25 TO OLZOM / MONOT/ DORDI WITH SID LFPB 5C AND 5F IN FORCE - PARTS OF SID MONOT 5C / 5F AND DORDI 5C / 5F ARE NO LONGER USABLE AFT 12 NM FM BT. - THE FLW DEP CLR CONFIRMED BY AD DELIVERY : FLW THE INITIAL PART OF THE DEP SID CONV MONOT 5C OR 5F CMB 4000 FT AMSL ON RADIAL BT 245 RADIAL, THEN AT 12 NM FM BT, TURN LEFT MAG 123 THEN EXP VECTORING TO OXCEL THEN OLZOM, MONOT OR DORDI. - RDO COM FAILURE: SQUAWK 7600 FLW THE INITIAL PART OF THE DEP SID CONV MONOT 5C OR 5F CMB 4000 FT AMSL ON BT 245 RADIAL, THEN AT 12 NM FM BT, PCD DCT OXCEL THEN DCT OLZOM, MONOT OR DORDI COMPLY WITH THE LAST LVL CLEARED BY ATC TIL D 40 NM LOL THEN CONT THE FLT ACCORDING FPL IN FORCE ******************************** DEP TO RWY 21 TO OLZOM/ MONOT/ DORDI W WITH SID 5C AND 5F - DEP CLR TO BE EXP : INITIAL DEP AGOPA 5P CMB 4000 FT AMSL THEN, ENR TO PB253, INTERCEPT BT 245 RADIAL, THEN AT 12 NM FM BT, TURN LEFT MAG TRACK 123, THEN EXP VECTORING TO OXCEL THEN OLZOM, MONOT OR DORDI. - RDO COM FAILURE : SQUAWK 7600 FLW INITIAL DEP AGOPA 5P CMB 4000 FT AMSL THEN, ENR TO PB253, INTERCEPT BT 245 RADIAL , THEN AT 12 NM FM BT, TURN LEFT DCT OXCEL THEN PCD DCT OLZOM, MONOT OR DORDI COMPLY WITH THE LAST LVL CLEARED BY ATC TIL D 40 NM LOL THEN CONT THE FLT ACCORDING FPL IN FORCE ******************************************* DEP TO RWY 21 TO OLZOM/ MONOT/ DORDI E WITH SID 5J -DEP CLR TO BE EXP : INITIAL DEP AGOPA 5Q CMB 3000 FT AMSL THEN, ENR TO PB093, INTERCEPT MLN 360 RADIAL, THEN EXP VECTORING TO OLZOM, MONOT OR DORDI. - RDO COM FAILURE : SQUAWK 7600. ADS-B DATA FOR ECRA (EUROPEAN CONNECTED REGIONAL AIRPORTS PROGRAMME) OPERATIONS. 1.1.IN ORDER TO COOPERATE WITH ADS-B RECEIVER USED BY AIRPORT OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL FOR USE OF THE ECRA PROGRAMME AT EINDHOVEN AIRPORT,PILOTS OF MODE S EQUIPPED ACFT WITH ADS-B FUNCTIONALITIES WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND SHALL: A)SELECT AUTO MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE OR B)IF AUTOMODE IS NOT AVAILABLE, SELECT ON (E.G.XPDR) AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE. -FROM THE REQUEST FOR TOWER PUSH-BACK OR TAXI,WHICHEVER IS EARLIER -AFTER LANDING,CONTINUOUSLY UNTIL THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED IN ITS STAND. -WHEN THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED, FLT CREW SHALL SELECT STBY. 1.1.2.WHENEVER THE ACFT IS CAPABLE OF REPORTING ACFT IDENTIFICATION (I.E.CALLSIGN USED IN FLT), THIS SHOULD BE ENTERED (THROUGH THE FMS OR THE TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE REQUEST FOR TOWED PUSH-BACK OR TAXI, WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. 1.1.3.AIR CREW MUST USE THE ICAO DEFINED FORMAT TO ENTER THE ACFT IDENTIFICATION. 1.1.4.TO ENSURE THAT THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQ (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS) IS NOT COMPROMISED, TCAS SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RWY.

TEMPORARY PROHIBITED AREA ('ZIT PARIS INTRA-MUROS') OVER PARIS : 1/LATERAL LIMITS : SAME AS THE ONES OF LF-P23 'PARIS' 2/VERTICAL LIMITS : SFC-6500FT AMSL 3/STATUS : 'ZIT' WHICH COEXISTS WITH LF-P23 'PARIS' 4/PROVIDED SERVICES : FLIGHT INFO SERVICE AND ALERT PROVIDED BY USUAL AUTHORITIES 5/ENTRY CONDITIONS : 5.1/'ZIT PARIS INTRA-MUROS' ENTRY IS PROHIBITED, EXC FOR : -OAT T OR OAT I ACFT TAKING PART TO 'JOP2024' PROTECTION OR AUTHORIZED BY 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' WHICH COMPLY WITH THE INSTRUCTIONS PROVIDED BY USUAL ATC AUTHORITY -OAT V OR GAT VFR ACFT APPROVED BY 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' IN ORDER TO PERFORM EMERGENCY HELP, RESCUE, PUBLIC SAFETY OR ACTIVITY LINKED WITH 'JOP2024' PROTECTION MISSIONS WHEN THEY CAN'T AVOID THE 'ZIT' -GAT VFR ACFT IN CHARGE OF FLYING IN THE FRAMEWORK OF THE OLYMPICS FOR THE BENEFIT OF COMPANIES MANDATED BY OBS (OLYMPIC BROADCASTING SERVICES) OR PARIS 2024, APPROVED BY 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' -E-VTOL (VERTICAL TAKE-OFF AND LANDING) APPROVED BY 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' -ACFT AUTHORIZED BY 'PARIS-ISSY-LES-MOULINEAUX' (LFPI) HLP CTL AUTHORITY WHICH FOLLOW DEPARTURE AND ARRIVAL PROCEDURES PUBLISHED -TWIN-ENGINE HEL, IN CASE OF ENGINE FAILURE DEPARTING 'PARIS-ISSY-LES-MOULINEAUX' (LFPI) HLP ACCORDING TO THE REGULATIONS IN FORCE -AUTHORIZED FLIGHTS ACCORDING TO PROCEDURES DESCRIBED IN AIP ENR 1.2 AND HEL AERONAUTICAL CHART 1/100000 IN CTR PARIS (ANNEX OF DECREE OF 8 FEB 1984). 5.2/ UNMANED ACFT FLIGHTS ARE PROHIBITED WITHIN 'ZIT PARIS INTRA-MUROS', EXC FOR : -STATE ACFT AND ACFT DIRECTLY IN RELATION WITH 'JOP2024', APPROVED BY 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' IN FORCE WITHIN 'ZIT PARIS INTRA-MUROS'. 6/ADDITIONAL PROVISIONS : THE 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' IS THE AUTHORITY IN CHARGE TO PLAN AND AUTHORIZE AERIAL ACTIVITY WITHIN 'ZIT PARIS INTRA-MUROS'. -'ZIT' ENTRY REQUESTS MUST BE SENT TO 'PREFECTURE DE POLICE DE PARIS' AT LEAST 5 WORKING DAYS BEFORE DATE OF FLIGHT. 7/AIR USERS INFO : MOULINEAUX TWR : 118.500MHZ ORLY TWR : 118.700MHZ LE BOURGET TWR : 118.925MHZ

UNITED STATES OF AMERICA PROHIBITION AGAINST CERTAIN FLIGHTS IN THE TRIPOLI FLIGHT INFORMATION REGION (FIR) (HLLL) AMENDMENT TO 14 CFR 91.1603 SPECIAL FEDERAL AVIATION REGULATION (SFAR) NO. 112 PROHIBITION AGAINST CERTAIN FLIGHTS IN THE TERRITORY AND AIRSPACE OF LIBYA WAS PUBLISHED IN THE FEDERAL REGISTER ON 21 MARCH 2023 AND WAS EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION IS PROVIDED AT: HTTPS://WWW.FAA.GOV/AIR TRAFFIC/PUBLICATIONS/USRESTRICTIONS/.

AX0002/20 AIC RESTRICTION HLLL/TRIPOLI FIR THE PILOT OF THE AIRCRAFT OPERATING IN THE LIBYAN AIR SPACE A. THE LIBYAN CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY STRESSES THE PILOT OF AIRCRAFT OPERATING OUTSIDE THE FIELD OF HIGH COMMUNICATIONS FOR THE NECESSITY OF USING VHF/ RT RANGE .RADIO FREQUENCY ASSIGNED TO EXCHANGE INFORMATION BETWEEN PILOTS VHF AIR / AIR VOLINTARY REPORT. B. FOR MORE COORDINATION BETWEEN THE OPPOSING AIR TRAFFIC, ESPECIALLY THOSE OPERATING OUTSIDE THE CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, IN ORDER TO ENSURE THE SAFETY OF AIR NAVIGATION IN THE LIBYAN AVIATION TERRITORY AND THE MENTIONED RADIO FREQUENCIES ARE: 1- WHEN FLYING AT OR BELOW THE FLYING LEVEL FL200 FREQUENCY 123.5 MHZ 2- WHEN FLYING ABOVE A FLIGHT LEVEL FL200 FREQUENCY 126.9 MHZ C. THIS AUTHORITY ALSO STRESSES THE NEED TO OBTAIN PRIOR PERMISSION FOR FLIGHTS BEFORE TAKING OFF FROM AIRPORTS THAT ARE NOT SUBJECT TO THE MAJOR AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL CENTERS IN TRIPOLI AND ITS BRANCH IN BENGHAZI BY WAY OF HIGH-FREQUENCY RADIO
